mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS id, u.nick_name AS nickname, u.email, u.avatar, ui.web_site, ui.intro FROM `cxblog-cloud`.sys_user u LEFT JOIN blog_user_userinfo uui ON uui.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN blog_user_info ui ON ui.id = uui.user_info_id WHERE u.user_id = #{loginId}

select u.nick_name as nickname,u.email,u.avatar,ui.intro,ui.bj_cover,uui.user_info_id,u.login_ip as address,u.login_date as lastLoginTime,u.create_time as registerTime from `cxblog-cloud`.sys_user u left join blog_user_userinfo uui on uui.user_id = u.user_id left join blog_user_info ui on ui.id = uui.user_info_id where u.user_id=#{userId}
